duties_responsibilities.duty: Articulate the vision and strategy for infusing AI/ML insights throughout the UKG product portfolio.
Provide analytical guidance and mentoring to UKG product leaders to improve data literacy and generate excitement about AI/ML.
Become a subject matter expert on the data assets across the UKG portfolio and accelerate AI/ML features to market.
Maintain strong collaboration with Data Science practitioners, Product, and Engineering teams responsible for delivering AI/ML offerings.
Provide direction, guidance, and assistance in managing detailed product roadmaps that realize the AI/ML enablement of UKG product portfolio.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
